title: Artificial Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/12/19
itunes:title: Artificial Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/12/19
description:
George Noory and inventor Vincent Peters explore the his work in the field of artificial intelligence, discuss if computer technology is advancing too quickly, and if mankind will be able to put memories into cloned bodies and live forever.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
